content: side cut the yarn prepare a sharpened piece of stick i use a walnut tree branch cut into pieces and sharpen it with a sharpener and turn on your hot glue gun once the glue gun is ready to be used put some hot glue inside the hole at the top of the pumpkin and poke your stick right in the middle of it hold it still for a moment to let the glue set and voilà your pumpkin is ready if you wish you could decorate it with a simple ribbon bow or tie a nice bow out of jute string umpkin number on a free knitting pattern by ewelina wojsz designs https //www instagram com/ewelinawojszdesigns/ 4
